name: .ZDP File Extension
summary: Learn about .ZDP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by DesignPro, an application used for creating and printing labels; contains the graphics and layout information for a label; used for business cards, mail, CDs, t-shirts, and greeting cards.

content: NOTE: ZDP files are similar to .ZDL and .ZDS files, except ZDP files are created by DesignPro 3.5 - 4.0 whereas ZDL files are created by DesignPro 5.0, and ZDS files are created by DesignPro 5.1.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
